summary: This mod is for nostalgia hungry nerds like myself whom want to pwn noobs in Skyrim (Special Edition)!!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][i]Dragon Longsword is a weapon from the MMORPG RuneScape, and as a 10 year veteran I am proud to say that you can now "pwn n00bs" in Skyrim like you did in the wildy![/i]

[i]Information:
[/i]--[/size][size=3]Does a whole 12 base damage (one less than Ebony Sword)!![/size]
[size=4]--[/size][size=3]Weighs only 4.0 units![/size]
[size=4]--[/size][size=3]Can be found on a table at Warmaiden's
[/size]
[size=4][i]Credits:
[/i]--[/size][size=3]Jagex Ltd. for creating RuneScape[/size]
author: Kurtwild
